explains: n. 小枝，嫩枝；（剖）血管小支，神经小支
v. <英，非正式>顿悟，突然明白；<古>察觉，观察

sentences.en: He shifted his weight and a twig snapped.
sentences.cn: 他挪了挪身子，一根树枝随即喀嚓一声折断了。

sentences.en: He takes roses, or carnations, pulls out a twig, but only when they're fresh.
sentences.cn: 他拿玫瑰，或是康乃馨，抽出一根小枝，仅仅是它们新鲜的时候。

sentences.en: The waves played with him and tossed him about as if he were a twig or a bit of straw.
sentences.cn: 海浪冲击着他，把他抛来抛去，仿佛他是一根小树枝或是稻草。
